articles.title: Baltic states call for new Belarus election
articles.description: The leaders of Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia urge Belarus to re-run its disputed presidential vote.

articles.description: The BBC speaks to some of those arrested and detained during anti-government protests in Belarus.

articles.title: US Postal Service warns of risks to mail-in votes
articles.description: The agency warned one state that its vote by mail laws are "incongruous" with current delivery times.

articles.title: China restaurant apologises for weighing customers
articles.description: The policy was introduced after a national campaign against food waste was launched.

articles.title: Australia surfer saves wife by punching shark
articles.description: A husband leapt on to the shark as it attacked his wife off Port Macquarie, New South Wales.

articles.title: UK marks 75th anniversary of VJ Day
articles.description: The Prince of Wales leads a two-minute silence, marking the day World War Two ended with Japan's surrender.

articles.title: Pompeo signs new defence deal with Poland
articles.description: The agreement, signed in Warsaw, will see some US troops redeployed from Germany to Poland.

articles.title: India legend Dhoni announces retirement
articles.description: India great and World Cup-winning captain MS Dhoni retires after a 16-year international career.

articles.title: France quarantine starts after deadline scramble
articles.description: Holidaymakers had just hours to return to the UK to avoid the 14-day self-isolation requirement.
